title: KODAK CA PRO 108 cm (43 inch) Ultra HD (4K) LED Smart Android TV with Dolby MS12 & Dolby Digital Plus  (43CAPRO5022)

product_specification.In The Box: 1 TV Unit, Remote, Wall Mount, User Manual, 2 AAA Batteries
product_specification.Supported Video Formats: MP4, MPEG, MPG, MKV, AVI, FLV, ASF
product_specification.Other Video Features: 4K HDR 10, MEMC 60 Hz, 10 Bit Display, HLG, Cast, Stream 4K
product_specification.Supported Audio Formats: MP3, MPEG1/2/2.5, AAC, HEAAC, ASF, WMA
product_specification.Other Audio Features: 6 Sound Mode (Standard, Music, News, Movie, Game, User), Sound Output Device (TV Speaker, ARC, S/PDIF)
product_specification.Supported App - Others: More Than 6000 Apps and Games like Netflix, Amazon Prime, Disney+Hotstar, Zee5, Sony Liv, EROS Now, MX Player, AirPlay
product_specification.Other Internet Features: Android 10, Google Play Store with 6000+ Apps and Games, Chromecast Built-in, Google Assistant, LIVE TV Channels, 20+ Content Partners
product_specification.Other Connectivity Features: Network PM44-11BP 100M Ethernet Support (10/100M, DHCP), Browser, Support HDMI-ARC
product_specification.Other Remote Control Features: Google Assistant Enabled Remote, Hot Keys of Netflix, Prime Video, YouTube, Google Play, Sleek, Stylish and Smart Remote
product_specification.Other Convenience Features: More Than 6000 Plus Apps and Games, Airplay, Chromecast, Google Play Store with 500,000 Plus TV Shows and Games, Google Assistant, Unlimited Content
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Warranty on Product and 6 Months on Accessories
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Warranty Does Not Cover Any External Accessories (Such as Battery, Cable, Carrying Bag), Damage Caused to the Product Due to Improper Installation by Customer, Normal Wear and Tear and Damages Caused to the Product by Accident, Lightening, Ingress of Water, Fire, Dropping or Excessive Shock, Any Damage Caused Due to Tampering of the Product by an Unauthorized Agent.
product_specification.Installation & Demo Details: We'll facilitate the installation and demo through authorized service engineer at your convenience The installation will be done within 48 hours of delivery of the TV.The service engineer will install your new TV, either on wall mount or on table top. Installation and demo are provided free of cost.The engineer will also help you understand your new TV's features.The process generally covers:Wall-mounted or table-top installation, as requested.Physical check of all ports, including power and USB ports. Accessories also checked.Demonstration of features and settingsQuick run-through on how to operate the TV

product_description.User-friendly Interface: Featuring Android 10.0’s intuitive interface, the Kodak CA PRO Series Smart Android TV provides a convenient smartphone-like user experience.
product_description.4K UHD Resolution: Thanks to its 4K UHD resolution, which renders images with improved depth, natural colours, and detailed textures, this TV ensures an enhanced viewing experience. Also, this TV supports various HDR formats, such as HDR10 and Hybrid log-gamma.

review: I purchased Kodak CAPro 43 inch Android TV from Flipkart. After receiving the product i watched two 4k HDR movies and found the screen quality and Sound quality is excellent .The HDR brightness of 450Nits is absolutely awesome for watching horror movies. the product quality is excellent. Iam totally satisfied with the product. the only downside is the wall mount: The wall mount provided along with the TV is good but very thin metallic frame, but after installation i found that it is equally good for holding TV with wall. As of now no complains. I would strongly recommend it for buyer.

I was quite hesitate while purchasing. However gave a it a shot and got this budget king TV.
The manufacture date is October 2021 , its a new tv on the market.
The TV was delivered 3 days. The picture and sound quality is great for this price. Soon as I turned on the tv I got a update which was nice to see. Android 10 is the version currently in this TV.
The wall mount provided looks small but does its job.
Go for it 👍❤️🎉

Good product by kodak.. Its value for money product.. if you can increase your budget then you should find dolby vision also which is not there in this tv.. but still picture quality is good enough..sound quality is also good 40W speakers does the job well. This product is better than vu and mi that are in major competition.. so its overall good enough these are all the pros still now i have not used kodak tv for enough time on base of 4 days usage i gave 4 stars after 1 month i will update my review..
Major pros:-
Price is good enough
40W speakers in this price range
Picture quality is good enough
Android software good enough no lag at all
Storage is not too much but you can add more storage by attaching pendrive or some external device

Cons:- (only used for 4-5 days yet) (after 1 month i will add more)
Dolby vision not there
Dolby atmos sound system also not at par
But sound quality is good enough

Conclusion:- in this price range this kodak tv is superb Go for it👍👍👍

Kodak TV's best serve the purpose. I really love the quality of the product, sound, and the display. The delivery was prompt and even the installation service met the expectation. Very happy with the product...definitely value for money.

Using since one month and just one word to say excellent. Picture quality is superb when the content is hd Or 4k.play store is there to install favourite apps and voice control remote is a bonus for kids to watch their things by just saying. Sound quality is good. My kids are now super happy, as well as us as the purpose of bringing this smart TV was to keep away the kids from mobile, as TV is less harmful for eyes in comparison of mobiles. Totally value for money. Go for it without any doubt.
Very good tv of this price ... Super Clarity ... Design is very attractive... Internet access is very easy ... Android phone connection is very easy ... Iphone to tv connection little heavier....
Fairly good tv for the price. Picture and sound quality are excellent. The remote works well and the software is smooth and lag free.
I got the kodak tv installed. The ultra hd clarity is amazing with mind-blowing Dolby surround sound. It's an amazing buy worth money
Very good product picture quality excellent digital surrounding sound is very good worth for money

One of the best purchase in Big billion day sale, got this for 30750 for 50 inches tv which is an excellent deal..

The quality is superb, screen top class, sound top class, features are amazing with the price given on time delivery and installation.

I have moved from 32 inch led to 50 inch Kodak Tv amd it has been an amazing experience till now.

Will update after a momths usage aswell...
Awesome Must buy, Sound and video clarity superb after 10 days observe and give the feedback, remote friendly use
NICE PRODUCT IN THIS RANGE YOU CAN GO FOR IT.

Overall product is good value for money
Product is not good sounds not good
Good Product and value for money.
TV is very good.. you need watch hd or 4 k video to see the qwality. Tried with air plan but couldn't connect..I will check and update my review again.Need to check if remote app available.
Very nice tv.. picture quality is awesome 😎..
Value for money. Very good installation service by Jeeves

For this price range, this TV is really good. The sound and picture quality is amazing. The 40 Watt speaker really do live up to their name.😄
Excellent product. Clarity at its best. Smooth delivery . Hassle free installation.

i,m using this tv from 1 month no issue till now. picture quality also very good & sound also good happy with kodak 4k tv
